ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Wind Magnetic Field Investigation (MFI) Composite Data in RTN Coordinates

RevisionEvent.Note: Initial SPASE XML resource description submission, metadata generated by AK
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by AK, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by AK 20230918

ResourceHeader.Description: Wind MFI composite data in RTN coordinates. The files contain multiple time resolution data: 3-second, 1-minute, and 1-hour. Final Version 5 data are accessible to within about 3 months of current date, newly defined Version 4 data (with final Bz offsets and not-yet-final spacecraft position vectors) between 3 months and about 2 weeks of current date, and newly defined Version 3 data (with the most recently determined Bz offset value, not yet final for the Version 3 interval) from 2 weeks to about 2 days of current.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: User will acknowledge the Wind MFI instrument team, and the site from which data are pulled, in any publication resulting from the use of these data.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Koval, Andriy; Lepping, Ronald, P.; Szabo, Adam

InformationURL.Name: Wind Spacecraft Homepage
InformationURL.Description: A web site hosting instrument information

AccessURL.Description: For ftp downloads of CDF formatted data from SPDF

AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessURL.Description: CDAWeb interactive interface for subsets, plots and lists of MFI data

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

NumericalData.Caveats: Note comments about versioning in the text description above

Parameter.Name: Time Line (1 min)
Parameter.Description: Number of milliseconds since CDF_EPOCH: 0000-01-01T00:00:00.000

Parameter.Name: Number of points in average (1 min)
Parameter.Description: Number of data points in one-minute average

Parameter.Name: Magnetic field magnitude (1 min)
Parameter.Description: Average of the magnetic field magnitudes (F1)
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is an average of high-time-resolution field magnitudes

Parameter.Name: Magnetic field magnitude's RMS (1 min)
Parameter.Description: RMS (standard deviation) of the average of the magnitudes (F1 RMS)

Parameter.Name: Magnetic field vector in RTN coordinates (1 min)
Parameter.Description: Average (1 min) magnetic field vector in RTN coordinates

Parameter.Name: RMS vector in RTN coordinates (1 min)
Parameter.Description: RMS magnetic field vector in RTN coordinates

Parameter.Name: Average range inner magnetometer (1 min)
Parameter.Description: Average range status of the inner magnetometer (1 min)

Parameter.Name: Average range outer magnetometer (1 min)
Parameter.Description: Average range status of the outer magnetometer (1 min)

Parameter.Name: S/C operational mode (1 min)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft operational mode (1 min) 1 - Science mode with normal telemetry rate (92 sec major frame) 3 - Maneuver mode normal telemetry rate - no useful data 4 - Contingency mode normal telemetry rate - no useful data 5 - Science mode with double telemetry rate (46 sec major frame) 7 - Maneuver mode double telemetry rate - no useful data 8 - Contingency mode double telemetry rate - no useful data

Parameter.Name: Wind/MFI operational mode (1 min)
Parameter.Description: Wind/MFI instrument operational mode (1 min) 0 - Primary to Secondary mag data collection rate ratio (1:1), Outboard mag primary with FFT and Snapshot data 1 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (20:1), Outboard primary with FFT and Snapshot 2 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (20:1), Outboard primary with Snapshot only 3 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (1:1), Outboard primary, Maneuver mode - no useful data 7 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (1:1), Outboard primary but used Inboard data for processing 10 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (1:1), Inboard primary with FFT and Snapshot 11 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (20:1), Inboard primary with FFT and Snapshot 12 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (20:1), Inboard primary with Snapshot only 13 - Primary to Secondary Ratio (1:1), Inboard primary, Maneuver mode - no useful data

Parameter.Name: Sensor zeros (inner)
Parameter.Description: Inboard sensor zero computed once a day. The count-to-nT conversion formula: B(nT) = SENS * (B(counts) - ZERO) / AMPL

Structure.Description: The 3 rows are for magnetic field components and 8 columns for sensor zeros for different sensor ranges. Current range is specified in RANGE_I.

Parameter.Name: Sensor sensitivities (inner)
Parameter.Description: Inboard sensor sensitivity computed once a day. The count-to-nT conversion formula: B(nT) = SENS * (B(counts) - ZERO) / AMPL

Structure.Description: The 3 rows are for magnetic field components and 8 columns for sensor zeros for different sensor ranges. Current range is specified in RANGE_I.

Parameter.Name: Amplitude correction (inner)
Parameter.Description: Inboard sensor conversion amplitude computed once a day. The count-to-nT conversion formula: B(nT) = SENS * (B(counts) - ZERO) / AMPL

Structure.Description: The 3 rows are for magnetic field components and 8 columns for sensor zeros for different sensor ranges. Current range is specified in RANGE_I.

Parameter.Name: Orthogonalization matrix (inner)
Parameter.Description: Orthogonalization matrix (inner magnetometer)

Parameter.Name: Payload rotation matrix (inner)
Parameter.Description: Payload rotation matrix (inner magnetometer)

Parameter.Name: Sensor zero flag (inner)
Parameter.Description: Sensor zero flag (inner magnetometer): 1 - No calibration data for day, used last available calibration 2 - Daily calibration value used (version 3 file) 3 - Daily calibration value used with updated Z correction (version 4 file)

Parameter.Name: Sensor zeros (outer)
Parameter.Description: Outboard sensor zero computed once a day. The count-to-nT conversion formula: B(nT) = SENS * (B(counts) - ZERO) / AMPL

Structure.Description: The 3 rows are for magnetic field components and 8 columns for sensor zeros for different sensor ranges. Current range is specified in RANGE_O.

Parameter.Name: Sensor sensitivities (outer)
Parameter.Description: Outboard sensor sensitivity computed once a day. The count-to-nT conversion formula: B(nT) = SENS * (B(counts) - ZERO) / AMPL

Structure.Description: The 3 rows are for magnetic field components and 8 columns for sensor zeros for different sensor ranges. Current range is specified in RANGE_O.

Parameter.Name: Amplitude correction (outer)
Parameter.Description: Outboard sensor conversion amplitude computed once a day. The count-to-nT conversion formula: B(nT) = SENS * (B(counts) - ZERO) / AMPL

Structure.Description: The 3 rows are for magnetic field components and 8 columns for sensor zeros for different sensor ranges. Current range is specified in RANGE_O.

Parameter.Name: Orthogonalization matrix (outer)
Parameter.Description: Orthogonalization matrix (outer magnetometer)

Parameter.Name: Payload rotation matrix (outer)
Parameter.Description: Payload rotation matrix (outer magnetometer)

Parameter.Name: Sensor zero flag (outer)
Parameter.Description: Sensor zero flag (outer magnetometer): 1 - No calibration data for day, used last available calibration 2 - Daily calibration value used (version 3 file) 3 - Daily calibration value used with updated Z correction (version 4 file)
